programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep10
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Glow / Breakneck'S Back - In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep10
programme.desc: Fake Ravine - When the Dinotrux settle together in the crater, D-Structs decides to go after their most important resource: the Reptools.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep36
programme.desc: Blue Moon Over Argentina - Odlulu takes the Guitar Key from Wizard Melodia in order to be the best guitar player in Buenos Aires. Only problem is that the Guitar Key is what Wizard Melodia plays the guitar to control the rising & setting of the blue moon every 2.5 years. Wally and Wenda head to Argentina to help Wizard Melodia get the Guitar Key back and put Buenos Aires back to normal.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Puppets Take Meanhattan / Zen & The Art Of Video Game Patience - Lucretia learns that her puppeteer idol isn't a very nice person. Audrey battles her big sister for the best score on an old arcade game.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Lucky And The Harvest Hunt - Lucky takes part in a secret Miradero tradition a nighttime scavenger hunt

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Enchanted Mansion / The Shell Game - While serving as Finly's magical assistant, Archibald gets lost in a spooky mansion. Archibald helps a grumpy hermit crab find a new shell.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep36
programme.desc: Krebbles Is Real / Tip'S Diary - When Oh thinks that his favorite TV show is real, Tip tries to maintain the illusion; When Tip's diary gets boring for Oh, he decides to create drama in her life to liven up his favorite book

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep10
programme.desc: Return Of The Four Constellations - The kids go to the Spirit Realm and meet the Original Four Constellations in the hopes of learning how to defeat Jindiao

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep14
programme.desc: Mihos - Cleo encounters an adorable alien creature and brings him home, along with his eggs. Wait, if he’s a “him,” how does he have eggs? Aliens are weird.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper – now “Chummy Sparklestone” – refuses to break character, and he’s causing problems around the village!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep36
programme.desc: Get Off My Lawn - When King Julien thinks he's a crime victim, he buys the village self-defense scorpions from a shady dealer, leaving everyone armed and dangerous.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep46
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep10
programme.desc: Sword - Dulcinea pulls a magical sword from a stone and becomes enchanted with heroic powers; Puss must help her learn how to control her newfound strength.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep10
programme.desc: Patch Games/ Mark Twain - Sherman's scout troop, the Laser Robot Tiger Troopers, earn their merit badges on the show; Mark Twain's gift for gab wins back his lucky typewriter.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep9
programme.desc: Turbo Drift - The snails and Tito travel to Tokyo to film a commercial and Turbo is challenged to a drift race against a beautiful and mysterious female cricket.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep10
programme.desc: Have Dragon Will Travel Pt 1 - The Dragon Riders are surprised to discover who is behind recent attacks on nearby ships – and to learn exactly what the ships are.

programme.desc: The Reckless Club - Jim and his friends are trapped in detention while tensions in Trollmarket escalate with fears of Gunmar's escape

programme.desc: Have Dragon Will Travel Pt 1 - The Dragon Riders are surprised to discover who is behind recent attacks on nearby ships – and to learn exactly what the ships are.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep36
programme.desc: Get Off My Lawn - When King Julien thinks he's a crime victim, he buys the village self-defense scorpions from a shady dealer, leaving everyone armed and dangerous.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Rupert And The Beehive - During a big thunderstorm in Nutwood, the swarm of bees lose their home. Bill badger attempts to reconstruct their hive with the help of his tool box but unfortunately it falls to pieces. With another thunderstorm looming, will the bees get a new home in time?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Rupert And The Lost Bird - Rupert is off to join his friends in the wood, where he learns that Raggety has just heard the most extraordinary bird-song - from presumably an unusual bird. What is it doing in Nutwood? Bill learns that many birds migrate from the Far South to spend the summer in the Far Far North. The unusual visitor must have been doing so but got lost and cut off from its flock. Rupert determines that they should help the lost bird on its way. Thanks to Ming and Rupert's car, they are finally able to do so...

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep47
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S New Games - Raa Raa is in a playful mood and sets off to find his friends. Together they incorporate everybody's game, to make one noisy, fun filled new game.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep48
programme.desc: Raa Raa Can Do It - Raa Raa is in an overly helpful mood and his other friends start to feel excluded… will Raa Raa realise the error of his ways and let the others help too?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep21
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Space Suit - It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help... Meanwhile, Professor Farrow and Lauren take the kids out into the snow and re-create the surface of the moon. Pat's determined to make his delivery, but how will he make it on foot through the snow? As the kids perfect their snowy “moon”, a space-suited figure approaches - Pat in the space suit. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep99
programme.desc: Poppy'S Big Race - It is the day of the annual Flowertot Race. Poppy is reluctant to enter as she always loses her way. Fifi and Bumble help her train for the big race, but will she win?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep100
programme.desc: Blueberry Hunt - Fifi and Bumble are off to pick all the ripe blueberries off the bush. But when they get there all the berries have disappeared. Who could have taken them?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger Hidden Yeti - The gang’s efforts to help JJ master the ancient martial art of Blamjitsu are thwarted by Walter’s plans to capture the Beanotown Yeti – whom they all think is a Blamjitsu Master, and guardian of the mystical Gloop of Greatness. Dennis and the gang defend the Yeti, and help JJ unleash her Inner Blam, in a gravity-defying martial arts face-off with the WilburCorp Henchbot.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Double Crust - Crusty the Robot Pie Spy has been hacked by Doctor Pfooflepfeffer and is sending her photos of Screwtop’s latest inventions so she can claim them as her own. The gang expose her scheme by getting Crusty to “leak” blueprints of the most terrible inventions they can think of.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep50
programme.desc: The Black Paladins - When all the controls fail on the Castle Ship due to a virus, Pidge must step up to solve the problem before it's too late

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep24
programme.desc: Amazamoose And Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Three - The mystery goop strikes again when Rocky’s stress ball falls into a vat of goop, making it sentient and gigantic! Now the stress ball is bouncing through New York City, getting bigger and bigger.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep11
programme.desc: New Tail - D-Structs loses his wrecking ball tail and wants to prove he's still dangerous, but when he gets stuck the crew must decide if they will save him.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Strutter Sitting / Corny-O Chaos - The Strutter siblings hold a yard sale and babysit at the same time. Archibald races for a big prize: a lifetime supply of his favorite cereal.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep11
programme.desc: Unholy Dragon Returns To The Mountains - Jindiao takes Po and the kids hostage in an attempt to locate the Wellspring

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Glamping / A Flower For Poppy - Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with “glamping” gear, the kids decide they prefer Guy’s plush method of camping to Branch’s insistence on roughing it./Poppy’s the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday. So when Poppy off-handedly mentions her favorite rare flower, her friends set out to find it for her- but who will get to gift it?

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep12
programme.desc: The Crood Who Knew Too Much/Scent Of A Thunk - When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep36
programme.desc: Krebbles Is Real / Tip'S Diary - When Oh thinks that his favorite TV show is real, Tip tries to maintain the illusion; When Tip's diary gets boring for Oh, he decides to create drama in her life to liven up his favorite book

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Lucky And The Christmas Spirit - When Miradero's Christmas presents are delayed and snow isn't falling, Lucky and her friends decide it's up to them to bring the Christmas spirit to Miradero.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep47
programme.desc: Why Skunk Smells - You see there was a time when Skunk didn't smell. Skunk smelt as sweet as sweet can be. Infact, whenever any animal had a smelly problem they went straight to Skunk. And then one day naughty Baboon tricks Skunk into tasting the yucky Smellyfruit! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep48
programme.desc: Why Cricket Crickets / Chirrups - You see there was a time when Cricket didn't chirrup. Infact Cricket didn't do anything at all and it was beginning to get him down. Every animal has a use. Elephant trumpets, Lion roars...but what does Cricket do? And then one day Cricket discovers that he has rhythm. Cricket finds the beat! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep47
programme.desc: The Case Of The Disappearing Special Things - When Fuse's collection of Special Things goes missing, Noddy vows to track them down. He soon works out that Bling was in Fuse's Workshop but it turns out that she just went in to add a Special Thing to Fuse's collection. More clues lead Noddy to Smartysaurus. She admits she went into Fuse's Workshop but tripped on an oil can and fled when she saw all the mess she'd made. As for the Special Things, they'd already gone when she got there. Noddy begins to despair but then he works out that the oil can must have been left by whoever took the Special Things. Remembering that Pat-Pat's scooter was squeaky, Noddy goes to the Treehouse and finds the Pockets with Fuse's Special Things. They'd 'found' Fuse's Special Things and taken them to start a collection of their own. They apologies for taking the special things and, as a reward for owning up, Fuse gives them a tool from his workshop to start their own collection. Well done Noddy. Case closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep48
programme.desc: The Case Of The Grey Coins - The Captain is upset because all of his shiny gold coins have been painted grey. It's a disaster as far as the pirates are concerned! Noddy decides to investigate. He realises that the grey coins are actually the gold coin covered with paint. They're not the only things that have turned grey too – Deltoid's shiny gold medal has been painted grey too. After following all the clues, Noddy works out that the Naughticorns are the culprits! They were jealous of anything being shinier or more golden than their shiny gold horns! The Naughticorns apologise to the other toys and soon everyone has their shiny gold coins and medals back to normal again. Phew! Thank you, Noddy! Case Closed.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep47
programme.desc: How Can I Make The Trolley Go Faster? - Jess and his friends are playing a game trying to use wind power to push the trolley through the hay bale arch. None of them can blow hard enough so it always slows down before it gets to the arch. Jess asks the Big Question - how can I make the trolley go faster. They try different ideas - blowing, making a bigger wind by blowing as a group, making an even bigger wind by flapping potato sacks but nothing is strong enough. Jess is asking Mimi for some help when a big gust of wind catches her potato sack blanket, making it billow out just like a ship's sail, which gives Jess a great idea! Maybe if he ties the sacks to the trolley, like a sail, the trolley will move in the wind. Success! Jess has answered another Big Question - he can move the trolley through the hay bale arch by tying a sail to it! And now they can all have fun riding in the trolley too! Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep48
programme.desc: How Can We Mend Baa’S Trough? - There's a hole in the bottom of Baa's trough so none of the thirsty friends can have a drink. How can we mend the trough, wonders Jess. Hey, that's the Big Question. Jess decides to ask Horace for help but Horace has a problem of his own. He's trying to make a lovely new musical sound but the square shaped piece of bark he's got doesn't make a very good noise when he clangs it with a stick. Jess borrows the bark to cover the hole in the trough but it's the wrong shape. He decides to ask Mimi for help with making a different shape to cover the hole. Mimi's making a mosaic, but she can't find anything the right shape to fit the square-shaped hole she has. Jess gives her the bit of bark and it fits perfectly! She sings Jess a shapes song explaining all about different shapes around us. Jess finds a squashed clay pot which is circle shaped. It's the perfect shape to mend the hole – and because it's clay the water won't leak out again! They've answered the question. And here comes the rain again so the

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep11
programme.desc: Cruise Control / R/C Turbo - The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a race—loser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep11
programme.desc: New Tail - D-Structs loses his wrecking ball tail and wants to prove he's still dangerous, but when he gets stuck the crew must decide if they will save him.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Once Upon A Time In Denmark - When Odlulu uses the Fairytale Key to pull Hans Christian Andersen’s fairytale characters from an old storybook and into present day Copenhagen, the Wanderers must rely on their knowledge of these timeless stories to put these characters back where they belong.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep37
programme.desc: A Tale Of Three Kiddies / Austland City Limits - In honor of #ThrowbackThursday, each Harvey Girl shares a story from her past. Gerald takes the gang to visit his hometown.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Lucky And The Christmas Spirit - When Miradero's Christmas presents are delayed and snow isn't falling, Lucky and her friends decide it's up to them to bring the Christmas spirit to Miradero.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Strutter Sitting / Corny-O Chaos - The Strutter siblings hold a yard sale and babysit at the same time. Archibald races for a big prize: a lifetime supply of his favorite cereal.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep37
programme.desc: The Great Chicago Hot Dog Crisis/ Wrinkly Humans Kids - Tip and Oh reveal how they invented sock dawgs to avoid war between humans and Boov; When Bobe and Guppa come to babysit, Tip and Oh have a crazy fun time with them, until Tip has to be the adult

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep49
programme.desc: Rupert And The Sailing Race - Whilst down at the stream with Rupert and Co, the fox twins mis-read the words to one of Ping Pong's spells which causes everyone to shrink. Delighted with their new size and ignoring warnings from Rupert, the twins leap into their toy boat and immediately sail into danger. Can Rupert, Ping Pong, Edward and Bill rescue them before they capsize or drift under the bridge and out to sea?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep50
programme.desc: Rupert And The Flying Dragon - Rupert tries to help Ming to fly by attaching a balloon to him. But the wind blows and Ming is carried away. Rupert and Bill try and chase after Ming, while Ping Pong, unaware of what's going on, works with Edward and Raggety to make a proper flying spell for baby dragons. This is soon abandoned though when Ming is blown out to sea, and Rupert has to come and asking Pong for help. The friends leap in the flying car and chase after Ming, as she floats helplessly around Nutwood. Finally, its Raggety's magic that saves the day, and Ming is safely rescued. The friends agree to wait until Ming's older before helping her to fly… and give her an airborne ride in Rupert's flying car instead!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep49
programme.desc: Crocky'S Coconut - Crocky has entrusted Raa Raa with his very special coconut to look after. Raa Raa does his very best to keep it safe. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep50
programme.desc: Kings And Queens Of The Jungle - Topsy takes a game of Kings and Queens too seriously and starts to boss the other animals around. The animals don't want to play with her anymore, can Topsy help them change their mind?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep23
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Winter Games - The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep24
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bucking Bronco - Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or “bucking bronco”, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen… Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep101
programme.desc: Snowtime For Pip - All Pip wants to do is play in the snow. Fifi tries to help him out, and come up with a brilliant idea how they can without it actually snowing!

programme.desc: Buds At First Bite - Baby enlists Goldie's help to show Penny Piranha how to stop biting.

programme.desc: Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping - The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep326
programme.desc: Digging Up the Road - Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Freddy Fox - Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep161
programme.desc: Backwards Day - Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. How will they ever manage to throw a great party for Ron?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep162
programme.desc: Stuck - Froga has made Christopher a homemade helmet in watermelon, with ear holes for his stuffed animal Geegee - but when Froga hand gets stuck inside one of the holes, it's an adventure trying to release her.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Sad Day with Blue - Blue's feeling sad, so we play Blue's Clues to figure out why. Along the way to figuring out Blue's Clues, we help our Felt Friends and Blues' friends from her school deal with emotions and feelings in different situations.

programme.desc: Pups Vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party - Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Pups Save the Balloon Pups - Giant balloons floated away from a parade and it's up to the pups to save the pup balloons, the parade and Mayor Humdinger!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Buds At First Bite - Baby enlists Goldie's help to show Penny Piranha how to stop biting.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Paddington And The Summer Games - The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them?

programme.desc: The 100 Egg Challenge - The Great Egg Hunt has just begun, and Blaze and Crusher are racing all over town to see who can find the most eggs. Only the first truck to collect 100 eggs will win the egg-ceptionally tasty chocolate trophy!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S04 Ep420
programme.desc: The Midnight Mile - It may be nighttime in Axle City, but all the trucks are staying up super late for the ultimate all-night race: the Midnight Mile! And the first truck to cross the finish line will win the Glow-in-the-Dark trophy!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep608

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep169
programme.desc: The Key - Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep170
programme.desc: Fruits Surprise - When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.desc: Catch That Cake! - It's Darington's birthday! Crusher uses a robot plate to try and steal the birthday cake, but his plan goes awry and the cake goes rocketing away. Will Blaze catch the runaway cake before Crusher and save the party?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep412
programme.desc: Pups Party with Bats / Pups Save Sensei Yumi - Bats are drawn from their cave by DJ Rubble's new dance track. // A wind storm threatens unsuspecting Marshall and Sensei Yumi.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film - Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Paddingtons Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist - Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! // Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep624
programme.desc: The Fish Pond - Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Puppy Love! - Bubble Puppy's got a cold! While Dr. Martin, the veterinarian, takes good care of him, the kids spend the day thinking about dogs-a Guppy's best friend. But will Gil's get-well card will help Bubble Puppy feel better?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Bluestock - It's Bluestock - the Blue's Clues Music Concert! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what song Blue wants to sing in the show. Blue & Josh are excited to hear all of our musical friends sing including Magenta and Ally Brooke!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep116
programme.desc: The Thinking Squad - Clues house! While playing "superheroes" we hear a super strange noise. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where it's coming from. On the way, we learn about the powers our Superfriends have too!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Big Rig to the Rescue! - When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even Big Rig Blaze may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.

programme.desc: Pups Save the Circus / Pup a Doodle Do - Ryder gets a call from the Circus ringmaster – Ellie the baby elephant has escaped from the circus train! // Mayor Goodway’s purse chicken “Chickaletta” has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search Adventure bay.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping - The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep163
programme.desc: Switcheroo - When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born. Reversing roles, Froga will prepare lunch while Anna tends to Froga's strawberry plants.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep164
programme.desc: The Missing Socks - When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his SMELL BETTER MACHINE. When the machine ends one of Froga's beloved socks has disappeared. She's worried it's gone forever.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Laugh with Blue - Josh is being silly but still can't get Blue to laugh! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what will make Blue laugh. While we look for clues we find patterns with a goofy gopher and locate all the mixed-up things in Silly Town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Buds At First Bite - Baby enlists Goldie's help to show Penny Piranha how to stop biting.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Bobbi's Bongos - Bobbi and Ian's musical talents are recognized but if they go on a world Tour, what will happen to the Deer Squad?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Wheel of Steel - Some changes to the design of Kai's big Ferris wheel, that Sir Steel makes don't go quite the way he thought they would!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News - The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Paddington Goes Camping - Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep501
programme.desc: AJ to the Rescue - Blaze and AJ are racing through the jungle when Blaze gets trapped in super sticky mud! Now it's up to AJ and his new animal friends, to go on an epic adventure to save Blaze!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The Trophy Chase - The Championship Race is about to start, and all the fastest trucks in town are ready to roll! But when Crusher steals the trophy before the race even begins, it's up to Blaze and his friends to get it back in time.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep207
programme.desc: The Ocelot's Tale - A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Jaw-some Sharkventure! - Zooli and her crew of Marine Biologists escort their new friends Baby Shark and his pilot fish William to visit Baby Shark's great-great-great-great-great Uncle Slow Mo, and help them escape the determined fisherman who's chasing them!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Mystery On The Guppy Express! - When Oona's Bubble Kitty goes missing aboard the Guppy Express, Detective Nonny steps in to help. Knowing the cat must be on board, they race to find her before the train reaches its next stop--and Bubble Kitty may be lost for good!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep171
programme.desc: Bubu's New Blue Jeans - Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep172
programme.desc: Everywhere at Once - Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep212
programme.desc: What I Like About Blue - Hop in for a ride in Josh and Blue's Anywhere Box, where we can pretend to go... ANYWHERE! We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go, and visit the ocean, mountain, savanna and even our friend Polka Dots!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Animal Island - Blaze and Stripes sail to Animal Island - an incredible place inhabited by monster truck animals! But when a greedy lizard puts the island in peril, Blaze and Stripes must find their wild side to save their animal friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Pups Chill Out / Pups Save Farmer Alex - Roger's frozen food delivery truck gets stuck in a ditch. // Farmer Yumi's animals are stampeding towards town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Pups Save a Space Rock / Pups Save a Good Mayor - Everest, the Turbots and a Space Rock get trapped in a cave. // Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Bobbi's Bongos - Bobbi and Ian's musical talents are recognized but if they go on a world Tour, what will happen to the Deer Squad?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Over the rainbow / We're toast - The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent - Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit. // Mrs. Bird starts acting suspiciously, so the children and Paddington decide to follow her using the spy gadets.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and The Bad Swap - Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep312
programme.desc: The Amusement Parking Lot! - Beep beep! The Guppies love cars! But when Mr. Grouper's car breaks down on the way to an amusement park, will the kids figure out how to get this field trip rolling again?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Colors Everywhere with Blue - Josh and Blue are painting a portrait of their friends, but it's not quite finished. We play Blue's Clues to figure out who else Blue wants to add to her painting. While looking for clues we skidoo to help out our color friends!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Pajama Party with Blue - It's a special nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do for her first pajama party. While we play Blue's Clues we learn about why it gets dark and light outside and which animals prefer the nighttime.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep602
programme.desc: The Amazing Stunt Kitty - When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep207
programme.desc: The Ocelot's Tale - A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep96
programme.desc: Take Off - Po collects lots of balloons and takes off into the air! Floating high above Teletubbyland, Po waves at Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa‐Laa below. When the balloons pop, Po lands.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S4) Ep1
programme.desc: Octopus - Dee encourages a friend to say 'octopus' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see a giant octopus, a tiny octopus, a swimming octopus and a gardening octopus!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep56
programme.desc: Mailed It! - Janie the Postal Delivery Po needs a quicker way to get around her delivery round!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: It's time to catch the bus - JoJo and Gran Gran miss their bus home, so the pair settle down to wait for the next one. But getting the bus isn't quite as simple as JoJo thinks it is.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Follow the Rules - Monty and Jimmy Jones learn how to play the Slides and Rainbows boardgame, but when Jimmy Jones keeps winning, Monty suggests changing the rules, and begins to wonder why games need rules at all.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Monsters - When Jimmy Jones is too scared of monsters to go under the bed to fetch a ball, Monty tells him that there's nothing to worry about and wonders, even if monsters really did live under the bed, how they could be sure they would even be scary.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep33
programme.desc: Trampoline - When Dad has to stop having fun with the girls and go to work, Bluey and Bingo scramble to keep him playing games with them on the trampoline!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep10
programme.desc: The Choreography Badge - The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep9
programme.desc: Betty's First Day - The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didn't always enjoy playing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep8
programme.desc: The Hat Badge - King Tiger interrupts the Squirrels' quiet time when he turns up to the Clubhouse with a magic hat on instead of his crown.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep42
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Irrigation - Uh oh! Glitch accidently uses his size-ray to shrink the Go Jetters and Ubercorn so that they are the size of ants!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep41
programme.desc: Bishop Rock Lighthouse, Isles of Scilly - Glitch plunges the sea into darkness in a night-time adventure near the Isles of Scilly.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep32
programme.desc: Bumpy And The Wise Old Wolfhound - Bingo is sick in hospital, so Bluey and Dad sent her a homemade video to lift her spirits. It tells the tale of Barnicus' quest to heal her spotty dog named Bumpy.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep31
programme.desc: Work - In a game of 'Work', Dad hires Bluey and Bingo at his drainpipe factory. But when Bluey takes charge, Dad finds his new boss pretty tough, especially her no dancing rule.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: Andy and the Mountain Goats - Andy heads to the Rocky Mountains of North America in search of mountain goats. Will Andy find a new rock? And will he get back to Safari World in time?

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S2) Ep11
programme.desc: Racing Machines - Grace shows us three machines that are all designed to race! Grace drives a rally car in the forest, sees some incredible racing trucks and then has a race in a Stoxkart!

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) Ep10
programme.desc: Remote Control - The pirates find an old remote control, Captain Captain realises she can use it to control her crew!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep7
programme.desc: Tag's First Day - The Squirrels are crafting in the Clubhouse when Betty saves Tag from throwing water across the table instead of glitter.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep6
programme.desc: The Library Badge - When the Squirrels can't figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep5
programme.desc: Happy's First Day - Happy has always loved the water, even though it makes a mess. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep40
programme.desc: Cave of Crystals, Mexico - Can Glitch be saved from the Cave of Crystals, Mexico before things get too hot to handle?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep39
programme.desc: Wimbledon, England - The Go Jetters are at Centre Court in Wimbledon to watch the world's most famous tennis tournament.

programme.desc: Seacow Snow Trail - Sarah and Duck have received some Christmas Presents and are keen to find out who delivered them.

programme.desc: Garden Gaming - Duck is getting frustrated with his new computer game, so Sarah builds a version he can play.

programme.desc: Raindrop Music - Nelly and Nora gather rainwater so they can make their own raindrop music.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Lewis vs. Spivac
programme.desc: Prelims - After quietly working his way up the heavyweight ranks, Moldova’s Serghei Spivac smashed his way into the Top 15 with finishes of Greg Hardy and Augusto Sakai, and now the “Polar Bear” aims for even greater heights when he faces the UFC’s Knockout King, Derrick Lewis, in the main event of UFC Fight Night on November 20 at the APEX in Las Vegas. One of the best heavyweights of his era, Lewis has sent topprospects like Chris Daukaus and Curtis Blaydes crashing to defeat, and he has similar plans for Spivac in this pivotal showdown.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Lewis vs. Spivac
programme.desc: Main Event - After quietly working his way up the heavyweight ranks, Moldova’s Serghei Spivac smashed his way into the Top 15 with finishes of Greg Hardy and Augusto Sakai, and now the “Polar Bear” aims for even greater heights when he faces the UFC’s Knockout King, Derrick Lewis, in the main event of UFC Fight Night on November 20 at the APEX in Las Vegas. One of the best heavyweights of his era, Lewis has sent topprospects like Chris Daukaus and Curtis Blaydes crashing to defeat, and he has similar plans for Spivac in this pivotal showdown.
